alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:37PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Aitkin and central Crow Wing Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 937 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ironton, or 12 miles north of Brainerd, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Crosby, Deerwood and Cuyuna around 950 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Aitkin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
